XML.MSG: Log into the www.aeriagames.com GUNZ home page first and Click Play live to launch GunZ.
You must wait 1 minute before reporting again.
Please return to the main lobby to recruit clan member.
Can only be implemented in the lobby.
Can only be implemented in the waiting room.
Can only be implemented in the game.
The screen shot has been saved in "My Documents$1".
An attempt to save screenshot has failed.
Recording has been saved in "My Documents$1".
If you want to participate in the voting, press 'Y' for Yes; 'N' for No.
Select the user to be kicked.
The user has left the room.
$1 has been kicked out of the room by a majority vote.
The Kick Vote on $1 has been dismissed for lack of votes.
$1 has voted to kick out $2. Currently $3/$4 people have agreed.
You can agree to the Kick Vote by using /kick command.
$1 is trying to recruit '$3' for clan with $2. Would you like to join?
$1 rejected the offer to join the clan.
This clan is disbanded. The clan will no longer exist after 48 hours.
Only the Clan Leader can execute this command.
Only the Clan Leader and Clan Administrator can perform this command.
You have already joined a clan.
You are not a member of any clan.
Would you like to join the clan?
A new member has joined the clan.
Clan Leader cannot leave the clan.
Deletion cannot be done while you are a clan member. You have to quit the clan first.
The selected member has been removed from the clan.
You have to recruit $1 members to create a clan.
Are you sure that you want to disband the clan?
Are you sure that you want to leave the clan?
Do you really want to kick '$1'from the clan?
Do you really want to change '$1' permission level to '$2'?
The clan master wants to delegate the clan master role to you. Do you wish to accept?
Request for clan master delegation has been rejected.
You cannot delete a character that is equipped with a Cash item. Unequip the item first and try again.
You will return to the previous resolution settings in $1 second(s).
You can adjust the quest difficulty depending on what sacrifice items you place onto the two altars in the middle of the screen.
You have entered classic channel. Advanced moves such as K-style and other difficult-to-perform step moves can’t be used in classic channel.
You have not joined the clan.
Select the free channel if you do not want any level restraint.
You are to fight with all users regardless of the channel in the league game.
$1 is invited to the Chat Room.
$1 has invited you to the Chat Room '$2'.
Will be converted to the Chat Room '$1'.
Request being made to open the Chat Room ...
Request being made to join the Chat Room ...
$1 points are needed to raise your rank.
Please wait until the player agrees.
$1 has invited you to participate in a Clan War. Do you accept the invite?
Select the right number of people.
You have invited someone who is not available at the moment.
$1 have invited you to a clan war. Do you accept the invite?
$1' Clan has defeated '$2' Clan $3 times in a row and is very confident.
$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan recording $3 wins in a row.
$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan to record $3 wins in a row with great ease.
$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan to successfully record $3 wins in a row.
$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan $3 wins in a row.
$1' Clan defeated '$2' Clan stopping its consecutive winning streak.
$1' has won $4 Duel Matches in a row in $3 room of '$2' channel.
$2' has stopped '$1' from a winning streak of $3 straight Duel Matches.
You can move faster by Dashing
You can Dash when you are in mid-air. (Melee Weapon Required).
During defense, you can completely block bullets and melee attacks.
Lower attacks are impossible to defend.
With a long sword equipped, it knocks your target upward in the air.
With a dagger equipped, it pushes your target suspending him/her with its pushing power.
A successful break fall maneuver reduces the additional damage that you.
might suffer as you cannot move while on the ground.
You can avoid an attack by tumbling.
You can also fire a gun while tumbling.
Click on the right mouse button when jumping in mid-air next to a wall.
This move can only be used with your melee weapon equipped.
Press the Jump Key when you are close to any wall.
Press and hold the Jump Key when the character standing diagonal against any wall while moving
forward then the character can automatically run on the wall.
You can climb along the wall.
The function only works if you are very close to the wall.
Press the Fire key to play!
You will leave the game in $1 second(s)
There is no character to select. Create a character first.
You will advance to the next round in $1 second(s).
There are still remaining games to play. If you exit now you will lose tournament points. Do you still wish to exit the game?
$1 has won by decision for dealing more damage.
You must select at least one map.
You can select up to 20 maps.
[$1] There are no bonus chances remaining.
You have received “$2” item for $1 day usage as an event item for daily visit reward.
As a daily reward, Unlimited "$1" item has been placed in your central bank.
Please select your class in $1 second(s).
Increases $1 of attacking power per second
Applies $1 of fire damage for 4 seconds
Switch to mini map by using [$1] key.
If you quit Blitz mode in the middle of the game, 10 of your medals will be taken away, and you won't be able to participate in Blitz mode for a while. Would you still like to quit the game?
You access has been blocked for a while due to an unauthorized quit of the game. You have $1 seconds left to play again.
You need a manual to select the class.
You cannot select more than 3 of the same classes.
The other participant is waiting to load.
Switch to Help by using [$1] Key.
You will be invincible for $1 seconds when you respawn.
You have won additional $1% of XP/BP/Medal.
Make your soldlier annihilate the buildings. The building has 94% resistance against a player's attack.
If there are too many enemy soldiers, use your sworld. Soldiers are no match for melee attacks.
Upgrade using the $1 key. Your character will grow stronger.
You are currently near the barricade. Only half the damage will be inflicted upon you.
You are currently near the radar. Your HP/AP/Bullet will restore.
The enemy's reinforcements have arrived. Eliminate them to win Honor Points.
When there are 9/6/3 barricades left, ally reinforcements will be spawned. When everything is destroyed, the Terminator will appear.
You are currently injured. Stay near your radar to restore your health and regain bullets.
If, within $1 seconds, there is no attack, the play will be considered abnormal, and you will be kicked out of the game.
New "BlitZ" Mode is available for play! Would you like to transfer to the BlitZ channel?
Are you sure you want to buy the selected item?
Are you sure you want to sell the selected item?
Please enter the quantity to sell.
Please enter the quantity to purchase.
Please supply the Amount (number of items) to send…
Please supply the amount to equip.
Are you sure you want to send this item to Backpack?
The item will be consumed with each use!
Are you sure you want to sell this cash item for bounty?
You have won $1EXP and $2Bounty for clearing the round.
If you leave during the challenge, you cannot receive the reward item.

If you start the game with less than the recommended number of players, you will receive the bounty and experience, but you won't be able to receive the reward item. Do you still want to start the game? ?
A hacking attempt has been detected.
The selected language will be applied after restarting the game. Would you like to restart?
You received this item $1 day(s) and $2 hour(s) ago.
We have closed the item info pop-up due to Premium store refreshment.
We have closed the item info pop-up due to Bounty store refreshment.
We have closed the item info pop-up due to Medal Shop refreshment.
You can purchase items with the medals you receive throughout gameplay. BlitZ mode is the fastest way to collect medals.

^1'$1' is removed from your Ignore list.

^1This player is already registered on your Ignore list.

A hacking attempt has been detected. In accordance with the agreement that members have consented, the GUNZ Operation Team continues to monitor and collect information on the users who hack. Keep in mind that all the responsibility brought about by committing any illegal act in civil or criminal case falls on the shoulders of the user who commits such an illegal act.
You can mount or release an equipment by dragging or double clicking an icon. You cannot send a bounty equipment (item) to the Storage.
WARNING: GunZ does not support the $1. You may be unable to view certain fonts or proceed with gameplay. Do you still wish to continue?
GunZ requires DirectX 9.0c to run properly. Would you like to install DirectX 9.0c now?
Please enter 'YES' if you would like to delete this character.
Your chat has been blocked by the administrator.
고객님은 만 16세 미만으로 셧다운제 대상이기 때문에 00시 ~ 06시 동안 게임 이용이 제한되오니, 게임 이용에 참고 부탁 드립니다. 셧다운 $1분 전입니다.
고객님은 선택적 셧다운제의 대상입니다. 셧다운 $1분 전입니다.
쿨링오프 제도로 인해 과도한 게임 이용이 제한됩니다. 접속 종료 $분 전입니다.
You must select the target player to report.
You must select the reason for reporting this player.
You have '$1' chance to report remaining.
You have used all of your chances to report.
Your report has been cancelled due to an unexpected problem. Please try again.

Your recent gameplay for the past few minutes will be submitted with your report. When the integrity of the report is verified, your report will be processed normally. Do you still want to report $1 as an abusive player?
There is a word '$1' that you cannot use.
